title: king
body:
<<avatar king>>Hello [b]Alanna[/b] how everything is going.
I'm a little busy right now, would you help me.
Have you seen Jaina? [[ Yes |jainayes]] [[ No |jainano]]

title: jainano
body:
Then [b]look for her please.[/b]!
I don't have time for looking her right now...

title: jainayes
body:
<<if $quest2 == true and $quest3 == true>>
<< avatar king>>Oh yeah? You saw her she is so cute right?
Please tell her that I miss her and that she come see me from time to time.
<< avatar alanna>>Actually she send you a gift take this flowers ðŸŒ¼ 
<< avatar king>>Oh, she is so nice, and so you thank you so much for everything. 
<< avatar alanna>><< speed 1.1>> Any time your majesty. Good bye now. 
<<else>>
You certainly haven't seen her, I haven't seen her either, can you please look for her.
<<endif>>

title: ashley
body:
<<if $quest1 == true>>
<<avatar ashley>>Hi again, did you find those knives?
[[ Yes |knivesquestyes]] [[ No |waiting]]
<<else>> 
<<avatar ashley>> Nice to meet you, I am [color=#00ff00]Ashley[/color].
I have a quest for you please go to the next room and get some knives for me.
I can give you a [color=#ffff00]Golden Key[/color] as a reward.
What would you like to do accept the quest?
[[ Yes |acceptquest]] [[ No |rejectquest]] [[ Nothing... |waiting]]
<<endif>>

title: acceptquest
body:
Yay!!! <<set $quest1 to true >> <<showswitch yes>>  <<wait 1000>>Nice I'm counting on you.
<<avatar alanna>> Don't worry [color=#00ff00]Ashley[/color] I'll take care of this.

title: Start1
body:
<<avatar sign>>Press [color=#ffff00]Z[/color] to interact with the NPCs and signs.
Use the [color=#ffff00]Arrows[/color] to move and [color=#ffff00]Spacebar[/color] to jump.
And welcome to another Yarn's example for GDevelop 5. <<speed 0.2>> I hope you enjoy playing!

title: rejectquest
body: Oh, well I hope you change your mind. ðŸ˜¢

title: jaina
body:
<<avatar jaina>> <<set $quest2 to true >>
I am Jaina, nice to meet you.
I have a mission for you, can you help me?
[[ Sure |helpjainayes]] [[ Not now... |helpjainano]]

title: knivesquestyes
body:
<< if $quest1solved == true>> 
<<avatar ashley>> <<reward key>> Good, here take the [color=#ffff00]Golden Key[/color] as a reward. 
<<avatar alanna>> Thanks [color=#00ff00]Ashley[/color], see you.
<< else>>
<<avatar ashley>> Please [color=#ffff00]Alanna[/color] go for it. 
<< endif>>

title: knives
body:
<<if $quest1 == true>>
<<avatar alanna>> Hmm ... I think these are the knives [color=#00ff00]Ashley[/color] wants.
[[ Take the knives |takeknives]] [[ Leave... |waiting]]
<<endif>>

title: takeknives
body: <<avatar alanna>><<set $quest1solved to true>> <<hideknives yes>>  Good now let's go back to [color=#00ff00]Ashley[/color].

title: questdoor
body:
<<avatar sign>>This [color=#ffff00]Golden Door[/color] is locked only with the [color=#ffff00]Golden Key[/color] can be opened. 
<<avatar alanna>> The story says, that [color=#00ff00]Ashley[/color] knows about this.

title: helpjainayes
body:
<<avatar jaina>><< set $quest3 to true>>  Please take this flowers ðŸŒ¼ to the king, and let him know that I'm going to see him soon.
<<avatar alanna>> Sure no problem, I'm going to tell him now.
